reviewText: Boris Karloff is an oriental sleuth. His normal menacing demeanor is absent in these clever mysteries to be replaced by the normal humility of an oriental person.  The stories are convoluted, but Mr. Wong figures out all the twists and turns by the end of the film. Families can watch these films without worring about adult situations, graphic violence, or bad language.
Title: Mystery Classics V.15

reviewText: The description leads you to believe that there are two Detective Wong movies, when in fact the one starring Bela Lugosi is another Mr. Wong who is a criminal.  Sound quality is poor on all videos,even considering the available technology when these movies were filmed.  Save your money and buy a burger.
summary: Misleading description designed to get your $$$
Title: Mystery Classics V.15

reviewText: The mystery movies on this DVD was great viewing.  I will admit that I love all kinds of mystery movies but the Mr Wong Movies, and there are a number of them, are interesting and easy viewing, no blood and gore.  If you like the older mystery movies you will find this DVD fantastic.
Title: Mystery Classics V.15

reviewText: I remember Mr Wong from when we first got TV at home.  This was a real treat to be able to see these again.My husband and I enjoy watching the 4 movies very much.
Title: Mystery Classics V.15

reviewText: The review of this volume is the same as for the rest of the series. Some movies are good, others not so good. The quality on some are good, some not so good.
Title: Mystery Classics V.15

reviewText: I , personally, enjoy the older movies at times and these are good. yes i do enjoy modern movies , but older movies do have their charm
Title: Mystery Classics V.15
